text: Re tla be re qapile leshano khahlanong le Allah haeba re ka khutlela tumelong ea lona kamor’a hoba Eena A re pholose ho eona. Ha ho kamoo re ka boelang ho eona kantle le haeba Allah A ratile joalo. Mong`a rona U utloisisa tsohle ka tsebo. Re ts’epetse ho Allah. Mong`a rona! Rarolla ka toka lipakeng tsa rona le batho ba habo rona, hobane ke Uena ea chatsi tharollong ho feta bohle
